ModMetaData.name: No More Breach Raids
ModMetaData.author: No Way Jose
ModMetaData.description:
No More Breach Raids! Part of the most self-explanatory mod series on the market. Now updated for Version 1.3.3200
Plasteel walls or not, breach raids suck if you're not well armed. Twice as much if you're in a mountain. Three times as much if you hate mechanoids.
Want to turn breach raids off? This mod is for you.
This is an eco-friendly xpath patch. Load after any storyteller/raidstrategy-related mods for maximum compatability.
